explanation: Agent A is correct. In OS_TaskMatch_Impl the local pointer impl is only used to read data (impl->id) and is not used to modify the pointed-to record. According to MISRA C 2023 Rule 8.13, a pointer should point to a const-qualified type whenever possible, so declaring impl as const OS_impl_task_internal_record_t *impl would be appropriate. Assigning the address of a non-const global table element to a pointer-to-const is allowed, so this change is safe here. Therefore the reported violation is valid and the pointer should be const-qualified (or an explicit justification provided if const cannot be used).
